original_text: And David said to his men, “Every man strap on his sword!” And every man of them strapped on his sword. David also strapped on his sword. And about four hundred men went up after David, while two hundred remained with the baggage.
korean_text: 다윗이 자기 사람들에게 이르되 너희는 각기 칼을 차라 하니 각기 칼을 차매 다윗도 자기 칼을 차고 사백 명 가량은 데리고 올라가고 이백 명은 소유물 곁에 있게 하니라

sentences.original_text: And David said to his men,
And every man of them strapped on his sword.
David also strapped on his sword.
And about four hundred men went up after David,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 약 사백 명이 다윗을 따라 올라가고,

sentences.original_text: while two hundred remained with the baggage.
